entry.question: If the Combiner is treated like a new character upon combination, will Armed Hovercraft activate if moved from a composite part to the Combiner upon combination?
entry.answer: No. It would stay attached, but would not activate upon combination.

entry.question: Does Air Raid's bot mode ability trigger if you use Armed Hovercraft to do 1 damage to an enemy team?
entry.answer: Armed Hovercraft does the damage, not the character that has it equipped.
